label: Time-Lapse
def_question: Is this a time-lapse video played forward at greatly accelerated speed (more than 3× real-time), showing time passing rapidly over a long period?
alt_question: Does this shot speed up time significantly to show changes over minutes or hours?
Is this video played at an extremely high speed to condense long durations?
Does the scene depict fast changes that would normally take much longer?
def_prompt: A time-lapse video played forward at a greatly accelerated speed (more than 3× real-time), showing time passing rapidly over a long period.
alt_prompt: A shot showcasing accelerated time progression.
A video where clouds, crowds, or objects move unnaturally fast due to time-lapse.
A scene with exaggerated speed, condensing long durations into seconds.
